p: On the 17 th March 2020, Malaysia confirmed 2 COVID-19 related deaths, a 60-year-old man from Kuching, Sarawak, who had a history of chronic disease, and a 34-year-old man from Johor Bahru, Johor, who participated at the religious gathering in Sri Petaling, Kuala Lumpur [ 36]. As the number of positive cases remained relatively high, on the 25 th March 2020, the MCO was extended a further from 14 days to the 14 th April 2020 [ 37].
